name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Advanced version of the road to the goal:
On December 10, CCTV reported the conflict between Chinese coast guard ships and Philippine ships in the South China Sea, saying that the responsibility lies entirely with the Philippines
However, the amazing thing is that all 50,000 comments were deliberately discussing the weather

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: SF Express employees talk about their work pressure and living conditions:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 5, Professor Su Shicheng's team, the party involved in the collective cancer incident at Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hospital of Sun Yat-sen University, published a paper in the top medical journal Cell, and his son, who had just been admitted to graduate school, was the co-first author.
Netizens joked: Knowledge can be inherited

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On December 11, a teacher posted on a local forum in Changzhou that teachers in the main urban area received a notice that the pre-payment of performance-based wages would be suspended starting next month.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 10, the State Council issued the "Notice on the Guidelines for the Public to Wear Masks to Prevent Respiratory Infectious Diseases (2023 Edition)"

content: User contributions

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Police report

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, domestic media have begun to follow up on the report.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 10, at the Chongqing Olympic Sports Center Stars Concert, calls for ticket refunds were heard one after another.
According to the audience, the concert equipment had been malfunctioning, and the advertisements inserted between each singer's performance were too long, which led to the audience shouting for ticket refunds.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 3, Wenzhou, Zhejiang.
It was reported online that a girl was bullied by several classmates at Huangtian Middle School in Yongjia County. The video showed that a boy kept kicking the girl and yelling at her, while the girl curled up against the wall and dared not move. The classmates who participated in the bullying even applauded.
On December 11, a reporter from Nanchang Radio and Television Station contacted the Yongjia County Education Bureau and learned that the boys and girls who committed the violence were students of Huangtian Middle School. The girl who was abused is currently in the hospital for examination, and the parents of both parties have sat down to talk.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 7, a woman posted a video saying that when she took a Juneyao Airlines flight from Shanghai Pudong Airport to Osaka, Japan, the staff let the foreign passengers who were late with her get on the plane, but left her stranded at the airport. She believed that the airline favored foreign passengers. Her checked luggage went to Osaka that day, but she was stranded at the airport. 
On the afternoon of December 9, Juneyao Airlines responded to this incident, saying that on the 7th, the company operated the HO1337 Pudong to Osaka flight, and the passengers were affected due to staff errors during the boarding process. This incident was an occasional service fault, and there was no behavior of favoring foreign passengers. 
After the incident, the company immediately communicated with the passenger and provided the passenger with accommodation and ticket rescheduling and other compensation matters. The passenger took a subsequent flight to Japan on the 8th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 9, Hangzhou, Zhejiang.
Zhou, a junior student at the China Academy of Art, has a mother who was diagnosed with liver failure in October this year and needs a liver transplant. In order to raise medical expenses, Tingting sells paintings at a stall at 7:30 every morning, with each painting priced at 9.9 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At around 17:15 on December 10, a fire broke out in the North Auto Parts City in Fushan District, Yantai City. That evening, the Fuxin Subdistrict Office issued a notice stating that the fire had been extinguished, no casualties were reported, and the cause of the fire was under investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 8, someone jumped from a building in Yangpu District, Shanghai, and a cordon was set up around it.
On the morning of December 9, the president of Huaxia Bank Tianjin Branch fell to his death.
On December 9, a floating corpse was found in the sea near Shenzhen Bay, Nanshan District, Shenzhen. The Nanshan Branch of the Shenzhen Public Security Bureau reported: The deceased, He Mou (male, 36 years old, from Guangxi), went into the sea alone near the above-mentioned sea area at 4 am on December 7.
On December 9, Teng County, Wuzhou, Guangxi, Hedong Internet Celebrity Bridge. A young woman sat outside the guardrail of the bridge and wanted to jump into the river, but was rescued by everyone

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 8, at the Blue Sky Square in Shaoxing, a man stood on the roof and tried to jump off the building.
On the evening of December 10, someone jumped into the river at Xinmin Bridge in Guangdong. The photographer said someone also jumped into the river here last month.
On the evening of December 10, in Xi'an, a man stood outside the fence of the overpass and tried to jump off the bridge. He was rescued by the firefighters who arrived.
On the evening of December 10, at Daijia Bridge in Linpu, Hangzhou, the photographer said "the suicidal person drank too much and jumped into the river. Fortunately, he was fine."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A wife posted a video recording her police husband's cancer diagnosis, but the comments section was almost entirely filled with ridicule and celebration

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 11, at Wuyue Plaza in Changsha, Hunan, some netizens said they received a small card saying “Beware of homosexuality”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 11, Sichuan Media University began to collect information on students going abroad from last year to date.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 10, Xiamen, Fujian. Netizens exposed the dormitories of Tianma Optoelectronics Factory, which were not only bare-bones, but also filled with dozens of beds.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
However, the family experience of this policeman is actually very tragic.
According to the video released by his wife, her mother's house was illegally demolished by the local government of Shaoxing. She petitioned many times, which led to her husband's frequent suspension. The police station leader also forced her husband to sign a blank national petition double satisfaction feedback form, which forced her to divorce.
His uncle is also a policeman, and his elders are veterans of the War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression, but they still couldn't stop the government's demolition.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A blogger spent a lot of effort to spread optimism
